(575x1+0)/1 mod 1024 = 575. (575x3+1)/2 mod 512 = 351. (575x9+5)/4 mod 256 = 15. (575x27+19)/8 mod 128 = 23. (575x81+65)/16 mod 64 = 35. (575x243+211)/32 mod 32 = 21. (575x729+665)/64 mod 16 = 0. (575x729+665)/128 mod 8 = 0. (575x729+665)/256 mod 4 = 0. (575x729+665)/512 mod 2 = 0. (575x729+665)/1024 mod 1 = 0.
